akn:section.akn:heading: Scheduling of fact finding and dispositional hearings for children alleged to be neglected.

akn:content.akn:p: Except as provided in subsection (b)(3) of this section, a fact finding hearing for a child alleged to be neglected shall be combined with the dispositional hearing.
The fact finding and dispositional hearing for a child alleged to be neglected shall be held within the time limits provided in this subsection.

Notwithstanding subsection (b)(2) and (3) of this section, the dispositional hearing for a child found to be neglected shall be held within 45 days after the childâ€™s entry into foster care, or if the child is not in foster care, within 45 days of the filing of the petition.
